description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
St Jude and St Paul's Church, 113 Mildmay Grove North, Islington, London, N1 4PL

TPO Reference
T1 & T2 - Silver Birch of LBI TPO (No.101) 1991
T4, T5 & T6 - Cherry of LBI TPO (No.101) 1991

PO Number
TO80264

Work specifications
2 x Silver Birch (T1 & T2) South-western garden area of the Church grounds
Crown Lift up to a maximum of 4m above ground level
Cut back laterals to clear building to a maximum clearance of 1m from the vertical elevations
Remove deadwood.

1 x Cherry (T4) South-eastern garden area of the Church grounds
Fell to ground level and remove stump subject to a replacement tree being planted within one planting season.

1 x Cherry (T5) South-eastern garden area of the Church grounds
Crown Lift up to a maximum of 2.5m above ground level
Cut back laterals to clear building to a maximum clearance of 1m from the vertical elevations
Remove deadwood

1 x Cherry (T6) North-eastern garden area of the Church grounds
Crown reduce by a maximum of 30%
Crown Lift up to a maximum of 2m above ground level
Cut back laterals to clear building to a maximum clearance of 1m from the vertical elevations Remove deadwood


Decision:
Approve with Conditions
site_name: St Jude'S And St Paul'S Church
decision_conditions: The authority expects to see a replacement Mountain Ash, Cherry tree or suitable alternative subject to approval by the authority, planted in a similar location as discussed on site within one season of removal, positioning shall be within the same planting bed as the tree consented for removal, but, located in a more central; position further from the historic wall.  A plan of the location of the replacement location shall be submitted to the authority for updating the Statutory Register.
